content.raw:
I think this addresses the forum post:

1. I added a couple issues - not mainline to this PR

    1. [#!/osrf/vrx-docker/issues/13/evaluation-timing-verification](#!/osrf/vrx-docker/issues/13/evaluation-timing-verification)
    2. [#!/osrf/vrx-docker/issues/12/modifications-to-example-team-docker-image](#!/osrf/vrx-docker/issues/12/modifications-to-example-team-docker-image)
    3. [#!/osrf/vrx-docker/issues/11/oyaml-dependency](#!/osrf/vrx-docker/issues/11/oyaml-dependency)
    
2. I made some edits to the [README.md](http://README.md) that I’d like to commit to this PR, but don’t currently have permissions to commit to the repository.  May I have write permissions?

‌
content.html:
I think this addresses the forum post:

  1. I added a couple issues - not mainline to this PR

    1. #!/osrf/vrx-docker/issues/13/evaluation-timing-verification
    2. #!/osrf/vrx-docker/issues/12/modifications-to-example-team-docker-image
    3. #!/osrf/vrx-docker/issues/11/oyaml-dependency

  2. I made some edits to the README.md that I’d like to commit to this PR, but don’t currently have permissions to commit to the repository. May I have write permissions?
